programme.title: On The Red Dot - Head Above Water
programme.desc: (Encore) On the 21st of July, 4 Singaporeans made history when they became the country's first relay team to successfully swim across the English Channel. What did it take to keep their heads above water?

programme.title: Whispers Of The Dead
programme.desc: The death of a domestic helper causes friction between two nations. Ignoring the tense political climate, Prof Chao remains neutral in his search for the truth.

programme.title: Starstruck UK S1
programme.desc: Members of the public will be transformed into their most beloved music star for one night only. But they won't be alone as they will perform as trios who all share a love for their chosen star. One trio will face each other in the finale.

programme.title: The Void S1
programme.desc: High octane game show in which contestants complete demanding mental and physical challenges while avoiding falling into a 520,000 litre water tank. Hosted by Ashley Banjo and Fleur East.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Island Feast With Peter Kuruvita S2
programme.desc: Never faint of heart, chef Peter Kuruvita puts superstitious murmurings aside and heads to the voodoo island of Siquijor in the Philippines, a place not often visited by tourists. Here Peter has his scepticism tested by a local faith healer and cooks a dish with its own natural medicinal value before sailing to the nearby party island of Bohol.

programme.title: Famous Foodies
programme.desc: Famous Foodies tells you about what and where the celebrities eat, from healthy lifestyles to haute cuisine.

programme.title: Jo Frost: Nanny On Tour S1
programme.desc: Jo Frost is a parenting expert who's spent years teaching parents and kids how to get along better. From new-borns and toddlers to tweens and teens, a lot of parents struggle to communicate and compromise, and in this new reality series we join Jo as she meets families across America who are falling apart.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Surge [S5]
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) A legend of legends, Valt Aoi hosts an exhibition match featuring a revolutionary class of Bey: "Lightning Beys". Inspired by the battle, two unknown brothers, Hyuga and Hikaru Hizashi, issue a challenge: armed with their solar Beys Hyperion and Helios, this unlikely duo is going to topple Beyblade's ruling elite.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.desc: After Sloppy finds a treasure chest buried by the founders of Ollipolis, Ollie and Cherry have conflicting ideas on how to spend the gold coins. In the meantime, the Imp has plans of his own for the treasure. Ollie is in charge of the Ollipolis Summer Parade. He's determined to make it spectacular, but a sneezing Alien Pet accidentally freezes his parade over just before its opening.

programme.desc: The children head to the Far East to join Pig & Panda's comedy talent show. But what happens when the jokes are played on the children? Mama Ling starts a new food delivery service, but it doesn't go well and her rating drops. What will the children do to help Mama Ling improve her business?

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Before taking a nap, Grizzy locks the food cupboard to prevent the Lemmings from getting into it. And to be sure they cannot force the lock, Grizzy throws all the house tools into the ravine. The Lemmings find a crate of mini building-blocks which enables them to build a hammer... and any other object they wish!

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings' clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: LEGO DreamZzz
programme.desc: When Mateo's comic creation Z-Blob follows him from a dream back to Brooklyn, Mateo and his sister realize the Dream World is real and in danger!

programme.desc: A true story of survival, as a young couple's chance encounter leads them first to love, and then on the adventure of a lifetime as they face one of the most catastrophic hurricanes in recorded history.

programme.desc: (Encore) 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.desc: Dan Rosensweig, CEO of student services business Chegg, meets millennials with big dreams but are swimming in debt. Together, Rosensweig and his team advise and guide the subject of each episode to turn their financial situation around and move toward freedom from debt and student loans.

programme.title: The Wall UK S2
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Rooted
programme.desc: Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Jo Frost: Nanny On Tour S1
programme.desc: Jo Frost is a parenting expert who's spent years teaching parents and kids how to get along better. From new-borns and toddlers to tweens and teens, a lot of parents struggle to communicate and compromise, and in this new reality series we join Jo as she meets families across America who are falling apart.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo: The New Generation
programme.desc: Kim plays a game of Guess the Vegetable' with Yoyo, Yaya and the audience. Yoyo isn't too enthusiastic as he isn't fond of vegetables. Why segment - Why must I eat my vegetables? Kim explains why vegetables are so important to our health. She shares her favourite vegetable soup recipe and makes a deal with Yoyo to give veggies a 2nd chance.

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C
programme.desc: It's fruit day on CLUB M.A.G.I.C and the agents are out to discover the wonders of fruit! Miss P sends them on a mission to learn more about how fruits can benefit our bodies after Sham, Adventure Boy comes down with a slight cough. He feels better after chomping on one juicy apple, and then another and another! The LETTER OF THE DAY is 'e' and the words featured are eggplant, expand and elbow.

programme.title: Kit n Kate S1
programme.desc: Two small kitties named Kit and Kate love their toy box. As soon as they hop inside, magic starts to happen. Kid's imagination transforms their room into a blueberry island, race track or a medieval castle. Every time the kitties create a whole new world with amazing discoveries, surprises and not-so-easy-to-solve dilemmas.

programme.title: The Fixies S3
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.title: Dogmatix And The Indomitables
programme.desc: Dogmatix leads a gang of animal friends, the Indomitables, living in Lutetia (Paris in the Ancient World), who have to battle it out with the Romans (who insist on imposing their way of life on the Gaulish people). With its fast-paced high jinks, high-speed chases and a touch of magic, Dogmatix and the Indomitables will provide great fun and adventures for all!

programme.title: The Smurfs S2
programme.desc: Blue and small, standing only three apples high, the Smurfs might be hard to tell apart at first. However, each Smurf is a distinct individual with his or her own personality, their names say it all!

programme.title: What On Earth S2
programme.desc: Zachary and Leonardo promote the cafe at school, and garner the attention of a major food critic - snooty Jeremy from their class. Zachary's not a fan but Leonardo is impressed by Jeremy's apparent sophistication. Jeremy has an influential Toktok vlog on food, and when he turns his nose up at the cafe's offerings, it's bad news for the cafe.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Luggy
programme.desc: At long last, Luggy and DJ Blaze arrive home with the help of the firefighters. To their horror, they find two strangers in the house and Zachary is nowhere to be found. Upon the realization that these two strangers are up to no good, Luggy and DJ Blaze go into panic mode and find themselves becoming accomplices to their scheme. Back at the park, Zippy finds gets stuck in a slippery situation after his heroic rescue of Pee Wee. Will he be able to make his way back to the others?

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore S4
programme.desc: Zero waste cooking advocate Chef Issac Henry demonstrates his nose to tail fish butchery technique that minimises food waste. In the gruelling elimination pressure test set by Michelin-starred Chef Malcolm Lee, famed for his Peranakan cuisine, contestants will have to recreate one of Chef Malcolm's dishes from the menu of his newest restaurant, Pangium.

programme.title: Animals At Play
programme.desc: A team of scientists and experts takes us around the world to meet the wild animals that love to have fun as they ask three big questions....why do animals play, could animals have a sense of fun and what can animal play tell us about ourselves. This series is driven by immersive personal encounters with nature's most playful creatures, practical demos in the wild and innovative new camera techniques.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia Yr 16
programme.desc: The guys crash Dee's bowling league night and compete in a Battle of the Sexes at a bowling alley owned by the McPoyles. Dee, The Waitress, Artemis, and Gail the Snail versus Dennis, Mac, Charlie, and Frank in a classic match to prove once and for all who has the upper hand in sports.

programme.title: The Mekong River With Sue Perkins
programme.desc: In this fourth and final episode, Sue reaches her final destination - China, home to the source of this mighty river. Here change is sweeping through faster than any other Mekong nation, as China's economic miracle transforms even the remotest regions. Arriving in Yunnan's tropical south-western region of Xishuangbanna, Sue discovers how this once remote and sleepy region is now home to a booming tourist industry, with the indigenous Dai tribe at its heart.

programme.title: 6-Headed Shark Attack
programme.desc: Attendees of a marriage boot camp on a remote island have to fight a 6-headed shark that attacks the beach.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: This heart-warming and fascinating series brings you the most surprising animal friends from around the world. programme.title: America's Wild Seasons

programme.title: 无敌鹿战队 S1
programme.desc: (重) 四只小鹿拥有大自然赋予的超能力量，他们会运用自己的智慧和能力帮助动物们和城市居民。每当危机或问题发生，就是鹿战队出发的时刻！.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦
programme.desc: 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 历历在目
programme.desc: (重) 屠妖节是兴都教徒重要的传统节日，也称排灯节。每年的屠妖节，兴都教徒都会在家里点燃油灯，象征印度教里的"光明征服黑暗"。 从汉娜手绘、庙里祈福到逛市集，这一集，跟随主持人一同探索屠妖节背后的传统意义和习俗！.

programme.title: 环保特攻队
programme.desc: 千年前的《泗州志》留下预言，人与自然需要达成平衡，否则将引发一场毁灭世界的灾难。在灾难来临之前，必须分别找齐三个世界的三把钥匙，获得拯救世界的机会。但正如历史所证明的那样，人与自然的平衡并不是一件容易的事情。因为人类和动物总是会引发一些问题。无论他们是不是有意为之，但往往会过度开发，过度使用他们的环境，破坏精妙的生态平衡，并将这个世界送上毁灭的道路。幸运的是，骄傲勇敢的水精灵带领伙伴们组成了一支强大的环保特攻队。他们将勇敢地面对这场危机，并不惜一切代价拯救湿地世界，为后代保护好这个世界。.

programme.title: 星期二特写：人生下半场
programme.desc: (重) 人到中年，赚五位数的黎杏心大可继续持稳养家，公务员王俊耀本也能在工作中寻求丰富精彩。然而一个偶发事件使杏心质疑生命意义到底何在；俊耀也因为对环境问题关注，而渐渐不能独善其身。觉醒是一种挣扎，他们经历摸索、挫折，甚至担心对家人是否不负责任。抱着满腔疑惑又承受不容时光虚掷的压迫感，他们能做出什么决定？.

programme.desc: 就像只有在冰岛能吃到鲸鱼肉，在非洲吃骆驼肉也是一件非常有当地特色的事情， Blend Gourmet Burger，是在当地有名的骆驼肉汉堡店。肉的纤维有一点粗，不同于我们常能吃到的肉类，不少外国客争相尝鲜，甚至开玩笑说，吃过骆驼肉就可以正式变身非洲Local胃了！本次有摩洛哥旅游达人，唐宏安带路，带第一等小组到索维拉，海鲜烧烤街，由于索维拉靠海，所以现捞海味绝对新鲜，其中怎么在人潮众多的烧烤街中，喊价选购，怎么吃最划算 通通都由旅游达人带路，带大家一饱口福。 独一无二的精彩片段，千万别错过.

programme.title: 夜光神杯
programme.desc: 传说中有一个夜里会发光的杯子，谁要是得到它，谁就可以许三个愿望…… 天上世界，女娲娘娘降服千年蜈蚣精，以好善之德将小蜈蚣罩在杯中，并命小仙子杯仙负责看守，谁知杯仙误信蜈蚣精让它逃跑。女娲惩罚小仙子将杯子流入凡间，谁若有缘拾起，注水入杯中，便可成为杯仙的主人，并可提出三个愿望。杯仙必须待奉满一千个主人，方可考虑重新位列仙班。 从此，民间就流传一个传说：有一个夜里会发光的神杯能为人实现任何愿望….

programme.title: 危险的约定

programme.title: 光照不到的角落
programme.desc: (PG) 每座繁华的都市背后都隐匿着超载的危机。随着现代化和城市化的加速，越来越多乡镇人口及外来移民涌入城市，居住危机成了未来国际社会最大的难题之一。城市中的「贫民窟」因而迅速发展。根据联合国的统计，世界有32亿人居住在城市，而将近10亿人生活在城市的阴暗角落。城市贫民窟无疑为城市的发展带来沉重的负担。这个节目旨在探索各大著名城市意想不到的「低端人口」聚集地，以及那里的生活状况，挖掘近在眼前，却不为人知晓的城市面貌，看看每座城市在高速发展下被悬置的居住难题，而当地人又准备怎么处理这些危机。.
